# File ../lib/sqlpostgres/PgTimestamp.rb, line 29
    def initialize(year = 0, month = 0, day = 0, 
                   hour = 0, minute = 0, second = 0,
                   microseconds = 0)
      @year = year
      @month = month
      @day = day
      @hour = hour
      @minute = minute
      @second = second
      @microseconds = microseconds
    end
